issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h3. Doing a second run, sometimes I'm getting this log message:



[INFO] :   Starting Hyperloop assembly
2016-07-20T16:34:28.401Z | ERROR  | An uncaught exception was thrown!
Cannot read property 'shift' of undefined
2016-07-20T16:34:28.403Z | ERROR  | Cannot read property 'shift' of undefined
2016-07-20T16:34:28.403Z | TRACE  | TypeError: Cannot read property 'shift' of undefined
    at rmFile (/Users/Brian/Documents/bgapps/hyperloop-examples/plugins/hyperloop/node_modules/wrench/lib/wrench.js:382:33)
    at /Users/Brian/Documents/bgapps/hyperloop-examples/plugins/hyperloop/node_modules/wrench/lib/wrench.js:394:11
    at FSReqWrap.oncomplete (fs.js:82:15)
fields.summary: Hyperloop - subsequents runs fails one or twice

comments.body: Hello, Can you provide some more details like your platform information, SDK etc. This issue is not valid anymore. Thanks.
